name: fairy-aura

effect.sun-moon: Strengthens fairy moves for all friendly and opposing Pokémon.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Strengthens fairy moves for all friendly and opposing Pokémon.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Strengthens fairy moves for all friendly and opposing Pokémon.

short_effect: Strengthens fairy moves to 1.33× their power for all friendly and opposing Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Powers up each Pokémon’s Fairy-type moves.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Powers up each Pokémon’s Fairy-type moves.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Powers up each Pokémon’s Fairy-type moves.
